thread.section_title: Hotel Basss by HappyCulture - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: GREAT Location
thread.title_full: GREAT Location - Review of Hotel Basss by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Andrew M
title: GREAT Location
text:
Montmartre is one of my favorite areas in Paris. Hotel Basss was my first choice of hotels in this area. We received a very friendly welcome at check-in and they let us in our room early. The location is amazing, perfectly positioned in Montemarte. You can walk out the front door and have a range of delicious and fresh food, restaurants and bars. We didn't even have a chance to try it all. I also did all my souvenir shopping a few blocks away from the hotel, there were tons of great shops.
I would definitely come back here again! Thanks so much for having us.
